
#include<stdio.h>

const int N = 30000009;
int ans[N];
int prime[N]={0};
int fs()
{
	register int x = 0;
	char ch;
	do{
		ch = getchar_unlocked();
	}while(ch==' '||ch=='\n');
	while(ch!=' '&&ch!='\n')
	{
		x = (x<<3) + (x<<1) + (ch-'0');
		ch = getchar_unlocked();
	}
	return x;
}
int main()
{
	int i,j,k;
	prime[0]=prime[1]=0;
	for(i=2;i*i<N;i++)
	{
		if(prime[i]==0)
		{
			prime[i]=i;
			for(j=2*i;j<N;j+=i)
			{
				if(prime[j]==0)
					prime[j]=i;
			}
		}
	}
	for(;i<N;i++)
	{
		if(prime[i]==0)
			prime[i]=i;
	}
	ans[2]=1;
	ans[3]=1;
	ans[1]=0;
	for(i=4;i<N;i++)
	{
		ans[i]=ans[i/prime[i]]+1;
	}
	for(i=2;i<N;i++)
	{
		ans[i]+=ans[i-1];
	}
	int t;t=fs();
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		n=fs();
		printf("%d\n",ans[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
